mapper.insert: insert into employee(id, name, username, password, phone, sex, id_number, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, now(), now(), #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select *from employee where username=#{username} and password = #{password}

select *from employee
and name like concat ('%',#{name},'%')
order by update_time desc
